faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about InstaPSV.

items.question: Is InstaPSV free to use?
items.answer: Yes, InstaPSV is completely free to use. We provide all our features including story viewing, profile browsing, and content downloading without any charges.

items.question: Can Instagram users see if I viewed their profile?
items.answer: No, when you use InstaPSV to view Instagram profiles, stories, or any content, you remain completely anonymous. Instagram users will not be notified.

items.question: Do I need to create an account?
items.answer: No account or registration is required. Simply enter the Instagram username you want to explore and start viewing content immediately.

items.question: Can I download Instagram stories and posts?
items.answer: Yes! InstaPSV allows you to download stories, posts, reels, and profile pictures in high quality.

items.question: Is it legal to use InstaPSV?
items.answer: InstaPSV only accesses publicly available content on Instagram. We do not bypass any security measures or access private accounts.

items.question: Why can't I view certain profiles?
items.answer: InstaPSV can only access public Instagram profiles. If a profile is set to private, we cannot view their content.

items.question: Can I view Instagram Highlights anonymously?
items.answer: Yes! Our Insta Story Viewer allows you to view and download Instagram Highlights without the user knowing. Simply enter their username to access all public highlights.

items.question: Do I need an Instagram account to use InstaPSV?
items.answer: No, you can use InstaPSV without an Instagram account. Our tool works entirely independently, so you can browse profiles, stories, and reels without logging in or creating any account.

items.name: Jessica Lee
